name: Transformers
introduction: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
introduction: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
introduction: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

name: Transformers: Age of Extinction
introduction: Autobots must escape sight from a bounty hunter who has taken control of the human serendipity: Unexpectedly, Optimus Prime and his remaining gang turn to a mechanic, his daughter, and her back street racing boyfriend for help.

name: The Terminator
introduction: A seemingly indestructible android is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
introduction: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
introduction: A cybernetic warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a 25-year old drifter and his future wife from a most advanced robotic assassin and to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

name: Terminator Salvation
introduction: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

name: Twelve Monkeys
introduction: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

name: Bumblebee
introduction: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town. Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken.

name: Back to the Future
introduction: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

name: Back to the Future Part II
introduction: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

name: Back to the Future Part III
introduction: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

name: The Last Emperor
introduction: The story of the final Emperor of China.

name: Ratatouille
introduction: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

name: Stuart Little
introduction: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

name: Stuart Little 2
introduction: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

name: Speed
introduction: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
introduction: A space-opera spanning the dawn of man to humanity reaching the stars, 2001: A Space Odyssey tells the story of the Black Monolith, humanity's evolution and the rise of A.I.'s ultimate supercomputer HAL 9000.

name: Tora! Tora! Tora!
introduction: In 1941, following months of economic embargo, Japan prepares to open its war against the United States with a preventive strike on the US naval base at Pearl Harbor.

name: The Time Traveler's Wife
introduction: A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.

name: Mulan
introduction: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

name: La Grande Vadrouille
introduction: Several ordinary Frenchmen, helping British pilots avoid Nazi captivity, goes on an epic voyage through the occupied country to the Swiss border.
